.ratingAndReviewCounts .ratingCountContainer a,.ratingAndReviewCounts .reviewCountContainer a{color:#333;text-align:center}.ratingAndReviewCounts .ratingCountContainer a:hover,.ratingAndReviewCounts .reviewCountContainer a:hover{color:#333;text-decoration:none}.ratingAndReviewCounts .ratingCountContainer span,.ratingAndReviewCounts .reviewCountContainer span{display:block;color:#333;font-size:.8125rem;line-height:1.125rem;font-family:Tahoma,sans-serif;font-size:12px;color:#999;line-height:20px}.ratingAndReviewCounts .reviewCountContainer .aggregateCount:before{content:"\e91c";font-family:Icon Fonts;display:block;color:#94b70a;font-size:1.125rem;line-height:1.25rem;line-height:20px;vertical-align:middle}.ratingAndReviewCounts .reviewCountContainer .aggregateCount:before{content:"\e910"}
